summary: This document is a Certificate of Corporate Resolutions for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, detailing the authorization for the corporation to open and manage accounts with the bank. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers and the responsibilities of the bank in relation to these accounts.
keyFacts: The document certifies corporate resolutions in favor of Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It authorizes the corporation to designate Deutsche Bank as a depositary, custodian, or investment advisor.
The document outlines the powers of authorized signers to manage accounts on behalf of the corporation.
It states that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
There is a requirement for a confirmation signature from another officer or director if an authorized signer is also a secretary or officer.
